other_tests.findings: Fluid collection in the right forearm was identified and subsequently aspirated.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Fluid aspirated grew methicillin-susceptible Staphylococcus aureus.

other_tests.findings: Evidence of anisocytosis, hypochromia, and a few large platelets; no evidence of blasts or hemolysis.
Hypercellular marrow with an interstitial infiltrate of atypical small lymphoid cells.
